title: [BUG] libSkiaSharp.so does not have a 16 KB page size
body: XA0141: Android 16 will require 16 KB page sizes. The shared library 'libSkiaSharp.so' does not have a 16 KB page size. Please inform the authors of the NuGet package 'SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Android' version '2.88.7', which contains 'runtimes/android-arm64/native/libSkiaSharp.so'. See https://developer.android.com/guide/practices/page-sizes for more details.

comments.author: Grzegorz1223
comments.body:
> XA0141: Android 16 will require 16 KB page sizes. The shared library 'libSkiaSharp.so' does not have a 16 KB page size. Please inform the authors of the NuGet package 'SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Android' version '2.88.7', which contains 'runtimes/android-arm64/native/libSkiaSharp.so'. See https://developer.android.com/guide/practices/page-sizes for more details.

there is an ongoing discussion about this in this bug https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp.Extended/issues/308

the repo is updated, the maintainer needs to trigger a new release @mattleibow
